name: Movie Challenge Ultimate
description:
Do you know movies?
Are you a film lover?
How well do you think you can guess a movie if we only show you a sketch of it?
Ok, sure It's not as easy as you think! There is Hangover Part III but you will find really difficult movies too. How many? Hundrends of them... Do you need help? We give you coins to get hints. You can buy coins or earn them by finding correct answers.

So that's all? No!
We have a world ranking in Gamecenter mode.
We note that this is difficult movie quiz. Only a true movie buzz could climb high enough! Get to the Hall of fame..., if you dare to try... This is absolutely the most difficult movie challenge in Appstore...

Features:

- A lot of hundrends of Artistic Colorful Pencil Movie Sketches (a really great database)!!!!
- Film database included movies from Hollywood, Blockbusters, Classics, European, Independent, Asian...
- Gamecenter mode (World Ranking Feature)
